topic.title: Update from Tracker plugin
topic.shortdesc: How to update Tracker plugin to FusionInventory plugin

body.p: Tracker is the old name of the plugin FusionInventory for GLPI.

ul.li: Download file of the plugin here : http://forge.fusioninventory.org/projects/fusioninventory-for-glpi/files

li.p: Uncompress the file into the plugin folder of GLPI. File list seems to be like : :

ul.li: Go into the menu Configuration > Plugins

li.p: Install FusionInventory . The plugin will update the plugin. Update process can be short (few seconds) to long (many minutes or one/two hours) if you have a very old version of Tracker and if you have lots of data in the plugin.

body.p: These operations will modify tables and datas in database MySQL and rights on the plugin.
